attributes.action: make it a requirement for those on long term benefits to work for benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those on long term benefits, who do not look likely to enter into chosen employment (with exception of those who cannot work) should be forced to work for their benefits. This labour would include litter picking, sweeping/gritting paths, painting public areas, removing graffiti. There are too many people 'leaching'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
